section.name: MagicDraw Installation
section.p: This page provides directions to download and install MagicDraw 16.5, a tool for creating UML models. AndroMDA support this tool thanks to its ability to export models to EMF / UML2 files

Please note that MagicDraw is a commercial tool but a free Community Edition is available. The Community Edition is not open-source. Here's an excerpt from the Community Edition readme file: "MagicDraw Community edition is a free edition for developers working on non-commercial projects." Also note that the AndroMDA project is not affiliated with MagicDraw in any way.
Follow the instructions below to install MagicDraw 16.5 Community Edition.

ol.li: Download and install MagicDraw 16.5 for your machine

section.p: Set up a path variables in MagicDraw specifying the location of your Maven 2 repository. Models generated by AndroMDApp contain references to this variables.

ol.li: Choose Options > Environment from the main menu.
Click on Add in the Path Variables panel.
Enter maven2.repository in the Name field.
Enter the location of your Maven 2 repository in the Value field, e.g.C:\Documents and Settings\your user name\.m2\repository
